titleStmt.title: The magistracy and government of England vindicated in three parts : containing I. A justification of the English method of proceedings against criminals, &c. II. An answer to several replies, &c. III. Several reasons for a general act of indempnity.
titleStmt.author: Shower, Bartholomew, Sir, 1658-1701.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Sir Bartholomew Shower. cf. NUC pre-1956.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
